name: Submarine's Escape
description:
Game is about a submarine left in enemy lines, yet enemy doesnt know and expect them to be there. They must get out of there! That's my first game so i hope you will enjoy it.

Controls:

Go Right => D, or Right Arrow, left mouse click on the right side of the screen

Go Left => A, or Left Arrow, left mouse click on the left side of the screen

Dive & go surface => ALT, or ALT GR, or click on the dive button with left mouse button

Click on "Game Over" to restart the game,

Gimme feedback pls :O
